attributes.action: The PEOPLE should be given the right  to recall their Constuancy MPs.
attributes.additional_details: Every day we, the public are seeing our DEMOCRACTIC RIGHT taken away, either through Rich, elite, people, through the Law Courts. Now awaiting the ruling of the Supreme Courts. Surely the Voice of the PEOPLE is the Supreme Court. MPs have demanded that  they, want the Negotiation details are.(4 months before they begin) They are demanding that they have a final vote on BREXIT, ignoring 17,4 million PEOPLE how voted to Leave. MPs are sent to Parliament by  impliment to WILL of the people
attributes.background: BREXIT was declared after the People took part in a NATIONAL Referendum, which we were told, the result would be upheld and Parliament would ensure it happened. A very large MAJORITY of MPs are trying to derail these wishes. Some evenopenly saying they will not let it happen. This is UN-DEMOCRACTIC.
